channel.title: hse university on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in hse university on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: Interview: a short interview with me on the HSE university website
item.description: An interview with me on the HSE website has been published. I told why and how I came to be in data science, as well as about graduate school. https://cs.hse.ru/news/741609195.html

item.title: School: summer school on entrepreneurship (Faculty of Computer Science, HSE University)
item.description: Attended the HSE university’s summer school, August 22-26, 2022. Wonderful and realistically-sincere event. It was most interesting to get to know the participants and speakers, and the following topics: networking search for investment startup economics Full program. Certificate

item.title: Speech: SMILES (ML school at Skoltech)
item.description: Participated in the international summer school SMILES â€“ The Summer School of Machine Learning at Skoltech from 16 to 21 August 2020. In the poster session, I talked about two “AI & Satellite Problems” projects that we were engaged at the Laboratory of Methods for Big Data Analysis at the National Research University Higher School of Economics. Below is the submitted poster and the certificate provide. Poster PDF Certificate PDF Post about Data Analysis for Satellite Tracking
